featured.text: “When I got married last year, I had all these pictures that didn’t come out right.
After graduating from college, Morrison started to work as a teacher and got married in 1958.
Benson married Julie soon after he had _____ her heart and gained her parents’ approval.

definition.zh_def: 結婚；與某人組成婚姻關係。
definition.en_def: To enter into a legal union with someone as their spouse.
definition.example: They decided to marry after dating for five years.
